descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/6999-1-1327759286.png[/img]
[color=red]FILE INFO FOR WISE USERS:[/color]
VER: Finale
Dimension 2048x2048 (DXT1) with  Normal Maps(DXT5)


[URL=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1330609-if-youve-released-a-texture-mod-or-plan-to-please-read]  Martigen & community retexuring directives [/url] 


[color=red] NEWS [/color]
It is pretty finished...so it\'s final release, i ll update other res soon.
My next project related to this is a dungeon and its a good idea...do u believe that i hate fishes and i dont know nothing about them?! life is strange :) see ya 


[color=red] BE A GOOD USER [/color]
 endorse with judgement ,dont ask 4096x4096 before using FOV on textures,be propositive, dont troll and post some damn screenshot and video with ur double monster Video card... :P
I support a clean and Functional Nexus without fame hunters.

[color=red] BE A GOOD MODDER [/color]
Please dont hunt endorsment, dont add an useless file on Nexus, dont sell 20 minutes of your life in photoshop as work. This is my first texture ever, so dont tell me that u cant do something more than changing tonality-contrast and sharpening all... cause it is offensive.

[color=red]MOD DESCRIPTION:[/color]
this retexturing follows the ORIGINAL concept of Skyrim\'s slaughterfish, a merge between a croc and fish, a fantasy vision of real alligator gar fish.(google it if u dont believe me ;) ) 

So this slaughter is a fish with some reptilians details....maybe it doesnt match your tastes but i\'ve worked on it,so please look at it ...CLOSE!! ehehe, i\'ve added gills over the muscular movement i am very proud of it :)


[color=red]MODS:[/color]
May the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11] Step [/url]be with you. 

[color=red]CONSOLE call [/color]player.placeatme 00023ab8 2

[i]Have a good day, i hope someone will enjoy my work, feel free to be cruel and propositive :)[/i]
author: TheRagMan
